title: Minn. Town Outraged After Double Dots Over Its Letter 'O' Are Dropped
teaser: The new road signs for Lindstrom dropped the diacritical mark over the letter "o" â€” known as an umlaut. The area has deep Scandinavian roots. The governor intervened, the umlauts will be back.
